title: Figure 1 — Deficiency Classification (Sheets 1–3)
description: Interactive decision pack derived from Figure 1 (Deficiency Classification Flow Diagram). Presents one YES/NO question at a time and records a deterministic classification, required actions, and routing to downstream packs (Figure 2/3/4) as applicable.

nodes.question_text: The deficiency was an inconvenience to the operator and the SUT could be changed or modified in a manner that would improve operations for the operator.

nodes.instruction_text: Treat as recommendation. Recommendations can be written to the program office to improve SUT use in the fleet, or written to the fleet to identify work-arounds for SUT operations.

nodes.question_text: The deficiency was on a support system (i.e., tech-manual tools, parts, materials, supply system, etc.).
Did the deficiency induce additional work or cause the operator to perform tasks that add additional man-hours or steps that were not previously identified in the development phase?
Did the deficiency require the commander to maneuver, or operate their unit for time in a specific manner to ensure mission success?

nodes.instruction_text: Treat as an operational consideration (OPCON). The OPCON should identify how the deficiency affects the operation of the system, and how the operator can mitigate the effects the deficiency has on meeting mission requirements.

Treat as a Tactical Consideration (TACON). The TACON should identify how the deficiency affects the operational mission, and the tactical considerations for the commander which can mitigate the effects the deficiency has on meeting mission requirements.

nodes.question_text: Is the deficiency directly related to a requirement that is listed in the CPD, CDD, Life Cycle Sustainment Plan, or system publication, PMS, or other SUT reference document?
Is the deficiency directly related to a requirement that is listed in the CPD, CDD or a tactical listed in a TTP or CONOP?
Is the deficiency related to a derived requirement that has been concurred with by the resource sponsor?
Can the data collected concerning the deficiency and the operation of the system be characterized and analyzed quantitatively?
The data collected concerning the deficiency and the operation of the system will be characterized and analyzed qualitatively.

nodes.instruction_text: Request concurrence from the resource sponsor on the derived requirement. Generate a Blue sheet for the identified deficiency (refer to Figure 2 sheet 1 for OMF determination). On the Blue sheet state 'awaiting resource sponsor concurrence'. Generate Results paragraph that describes the deficiency.

nodes.question_text: Is the deficiency related to a derived requirement that has been concurred with by the resource sponsor?
Can the data collected concerning the deficiency and how the deficiency affected the operation of the system be characterized and analyzed quantitatively?
The data collected concerning the deficiency and how the deficiency affected the operation of the system will be characterized and analyzed qualitatively.

nodes.instruction_text: Refer to the Quantitative baseline flow diagram (Figure 4 sheet 3 of 4) to assist with determining the Operational Impact and Mission Criticality of the deficiency.
Refer to the Qualitative baseline flow diagram (Figure 3 sheet 3 of 4) to assist with determining the Operational Impact and Mission Criticality of the deficiency.

notes: This pack encodes Figure 1 logic and routes to Figure 2 for OMF determination where the diagram specifies it.
Support-system paths route directly to Figure 3/4 baseline flows per Figure 1 sheet 3 of 3.
Derived requirement concurrence paths record Blue Sheet requirements and 'awaiting concurrence' status, then proceed into the Figure 2 path as the diagram indicates.
